name: Kristen Ratan
title: Board Member
bio: **Kristen Ratan is co-Founder and Executive Director of the [Collaborative Knowledge Foundation,](http://coko.foundation/) a nonprofit with a mission to evolve how knowledge is created, produced, and shared. Kristen has a 20-year history working to accelerate advances in science and research communication, most recently as Publisher at the Public Library of Science (PLOS).  Prior to that Kristen held leadership positions at HighWire Press, Atypon and BIOSIS.  Kristen is on the Board of Directors of the American Institute of Physics Publishing and the nonprofit Community Resources for Science. She also serves on numerous advisory boards and industry committees.**
